protobuf.description: Affected versions of the protobuf package are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) due to missing recursion depth accounting that allows the max_recursion_depth limit to be bypassed. The google.protobuf.json_format.ParseDict() parser fails to increment or enforce max_recursion_depth when traversing nested google.protobuf.Any messages in its internal Any-handling logic, allowing attacker-controlled JSON to recurse far deeper than intended.
protobuf.reason_to_ignore: Patched to latest available version 6.33.4. Version 6.33.5+ does not exist yet.
